Tag.description: Creates a key-value pair for a specific resource.

Key.description: The name assigned to the tag that you create.

Value.description: Contains one or more values that you assigned to the key name you create.

AccessRole.description: Specifies the access role for the connector.
AccessRole.markdownDescription:
Specifies the access role for the connector.

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 20  

Maximum Length: 2048  

Pattern: arn:.*role/.*  

Update requires: No interruption

LocalProfileId.description: A unique identifier for the local profile.

PartnerProfileId.description: A unique identifier for the partner profile.

MessageSubject.description: The message subject for this AS2 connector configuration.

Compression.description: Compression setting for this AS2 connector configuration.

EncryptionAlgorithm.description: Encryption algorithm for this AS2 connector configuration.

SigningAlgorithm.description: Signing algorithm for this AS2 connector configuration.

MdnSigningAlgorithm.description: MDN Signing algorithm for this AS2 connector configuration.

MdnResponse.description: MDN Response setting for this AS2 connector configuration.

As2Config.markdownDescription:
Configuration for an AS2 connector.

---

Required: No

Type: object     

Update requires: No interruption

Arn.description: Specifies the unique Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the workflow.
Arn.markdownDescription:
Specifies the unique Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the workflow.

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 20  

Maximum Length: 1600  

Pattern: arn:.*  

Update requires: No interruption

ConnectorId.description: A unique identifier for the connector.
ConnectorId.markdownDescription:
A unique identifier for the connector.

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 19  

Maximum Length: 19  

Pattern: ^c-([0-9a-f]{17})$  

Update requires: No interruption

LoggingRole.description: Specifies the logging role for the connector.
LoggingRole.markdownDescription:
Specifies the logging role for the connector.

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 20  

Maximum Length: 2048  

Pattern: arn:.*role/.*  

Update requires: No interruption
